dark: Upon auto attacking, deal extra M.DMG worth 80% of ATK and recover 100 mana. There is a 10% chance of dealing double DMG and recovering double mana.

profile.dislikes: His fellow kinsmen who let his sister die

background.story: This lonely Dark Elf swore vengeance against his own race for the death of his sister. Having barely survived his deployment to the Aegina Desert, the only thing waiting for him back home was the dreadful news that his sister had been killed as an Elven sacrifice. As he cried out her name in the darkness, he began succumbing to madness. Eventually, he swore an oath of hatred and vengeance against his own kind, the murderers of his sister.

itemIntroductions.weapon: A treasure of the Dark Elves created using a powerful moonlight stone from Arrovina and a moon tree branch of the highest quality. Nerius is a perfect medium for Moonlight Magic, and it is one of the most powerful magic weapons of the Dark Elves. However, it is said that the beautiful silver light of the moon can easily be tainted by darkness. A sublime love has turned into deep darkness, and the dark elf longing for vengeance has fused that darkness into this weapon.
treasures: One of the daggers that Dimael shared with his comrades dispatched in Aegina. When the Black Moon rose in the desert sky, he gave them these daggers and they all vowed to face their destiny. They supported each other and tended to each other's wounds while fighting the evil creatures storming out from the rift. However, he was the only one who returned alive from Aegina.

A bracelet that was shared with Epigael a long time ago. It has shadow morion hanging, which is a precious jewel amongst the Dark Elves. It is said that those who cut off the shadow morion and will have a thread of their souls, which will lead them to meet again in the next life.

Tear fragments of the beast Heltanios, who lived at the bottom of the Fountain of Life. It spews out pitch darkness, and those who see its eyes end up having their souls stolen by the powerful dark energy. Those who become the master of these eyes will obtain great power and insight. When Dimael was captured in Aegina and was at the brink of death, Maria embedded these eye fragments.

The crown of Dark Elves. Remebering the fall and tragedy of his race and the royal family, Dimael still can't wear this bloody crown. All he can do is watch it and wait for the day the true king of Dark Elves appears.
